title: The Young Riders - Season 1  Eps 1-4
description: Welcome to the riders of the Pony Express who delivered the mail through the territories of the old wild west when you never knew who your enemies where and if they were lying in wait to take the package and probably kill you rather than let you survive.  As with any dangerous time you cling to your friends and colleagues or end up as just another anonymous corpse.  This show lasted for about four seasons and had everything you wanted in an old fashioned tale of danger and love, with the bonus of a younger [b]Josh Brolin [/b] hop on a horse with him (not for real, oh I wish :-*  ;) ) and enjoy the ride of your life!  ;)  ;)  ;)
